General.Name: Pacific Metals Co. Ltd
General.Description: Pacific Metals Co., Ltd. produces and sells ferro-nickel and ferro-nickel slag products in Japan and internationally. It operates through Nickel, Gas, and Other business segments. The company offers ferro-nickel that is used as a raw material for stainless steel; ferro-nickel slag that is used as a civil engineering material and mineral slag products. In addition, it is involved in waste recycling business. Further, the company engages in transport contracting and real estate businesses, as well as produces and sells oxygen and nitrogen gas. The company was formerly known as Nisso Steel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Pacific Metals Co., Ltd. in January 1970. Pacific Metals Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1949 and is headquartered in Hachinohe, Japan.
